name: Verify Admin can change Manager role to Admin
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:
- `Admin` can change user role from `Manager` to `Admin`
- User after changing role from `Manager` to `Admin`:

- Can access organization `Settings`.
- Can access organization `Billing`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can change user role from Manager to Admin

  • User after changing role from Manager to Admin:

  • Can access organization Settings.

  • Can access organization Billing.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:
- `Admin` can change user role from `Manager` to `Admin`
- User after changing role from `Manager` to `Admin`:

- Can access organization `Settings`.
- Can access organization `Billing`.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can change user role from Manager to Admin

  • User after changing role from Manager to Admin:

  • Can access organization Settings.

  • Can access organization Billing.
